title: Shopping City Timișoara
text:
Shopping City Timișoara is a <a href="shopping%20mall">shopping mall</a> located in <a href="Timi%C8%99oara">Timișoara</a>, <a href="Romania">Romania</a>. At the time of its completion, it was the second shopping mall in Timișoara. In the first year since its opening in 2016, Shopping City Timișoara had a traffic of over nine million visitors.
Facilities.
The mall is built on an 18-hectare plot of land and has a leasable area of 70,000 m2. The two-story construction has 110 shops, 2,700 on-site and above-ground <a href="parking%20space">parking space</a>s with electric/hybrid car charging stations, a self-service <a href="car%20wash">car wash</a> and bicycle racks. It has a 13-screen <a href="Cinema%20City%20International">Cinema City</a> multiplex with <a href="IMAX">IMAX</a> and <a href="4DX">4DX</a> halls which is the first and only cinema in Romania with these technologies in one cinema. With a total capacity of 2,400 seats and an area of 4,000 m2, it is the largest multiplex outside <a href="Bucharest">Bucharest</a>. 10,000 m2 of its leasable area are occupied by a <a href="Carrefour">Carrefour</a> <a href="hypermarket">hypermarket</a>, and 16,000 m2 by a <a href="Dedeman">Dedeman</a> <a href="DIY">DIY</a> store. The mall also includes a <a href="food%20court">food court</a>, a <a href="fitness%20center">fitness center</a> with a semi-Olympic <a href="swimming%20pool">swimming pool</a>, a <a href="casino">casino</a>, a seasonal <a href="ice%20rink">ice rink</a>, <a href="terrace%20%28building%29">terraces</a> and a 350-square-meter children's <a href="playground">playground</a>.
